code: import axios from"axios";const api=axios.create({baseURL:process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||"http://localhost:5000"});api.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const stored=localStorage.getItem("user");if(stored){const parsed=JSON.parse(stored);if(parsed.token){config.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(parsed.token);}}return config;});export default api;
